Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of H.R. 988, a bill to amend the  charter of the National Woman's Relief Corps to formally change its  principal office from Springfield, Illinois, to Murphysboro, Illinois,  where I understand it is already located. It also moves its place of  incorporation from Washington, D.C., to Illinois.
